comment:
Variables:
- x: number of rural factories
- y: number of urban factories

Constraints:
- 8x + 20y \leq 260 (total number of managers available)
- 100x + 200y \geq 3000 (minimum number of phones to be produced)
- x \geq 0
- y \geq 0

Objective:
- Minimize Z = x + y (total number of factories)
